initialResponse.subject: Re: Garden {buildingType} Enquiry
initialResponse.body:
Hi {customerFirstName},

Thank you for your valued enquiry. It's great to hear you are considering a {buildingTypeLower} for your home. This is certainly something we can help with.

The next step would be a site visit to discuss the project further. We can run through all of your requirements and from there we will provide an official quote, and welcome you to visit our showroom or a previous customers' project to see one of our buildings first-hand.

Are you available next week? Please could you also provide your full address and contact number?

Please let me know if you have any questions in the meantime..

Many thanks,
Liam

depositConfirmation.body:
Hi {customerFirstName},

Great news that you'd like to proceed.

drawingSent.subject: Drawing and Specification - {customerName}
drawingSent.body:
Hi {customerFirstName},

Hope all is well. I've attached the following:
- Updated drawing of your building
- Specification with payment schedule
- Our internal flooring options - please could you let me know what you'd like?
- First stage invoice that is now due

Please advise when payment is made and I will confirm receipt.

We are due to deliver and start installation w/c {deliveryDate}.

Regarding a skip, we ask that customers organise this before we arrive on site. We recommend an 8 yard skip.

Also, are we also able to use your downstairs toilet?

We look forward to finally getting started!

Many thanks,
Liam
